mapper.select: SELECT f.favoritep_no , f.favoritep_reg_date , p.pet_notice_no , p.popfile , p.careNm , p.careAddr , p.careTel , f.nickname FROM favoritep f JOIN pet_notice p ON f.pet_notice_no = p.pet_notice_no WHERE f.nickname=#{nickname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT pet_notice_no FROM favoritep WHERE nickname=#{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT favoritep_no ,favoritep_reg_date ,pet_notice_no ,popfile ,careNm ,careAddr ,careTel ,nickname FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as RN ,f.favoritep_no , f.favoritep_reg_date , p.pet_notice_no , p.popfile , p.careNm , p.careAddr , p.careTel , f.nickname FROM favoritep f JOIN pet_notice p ON f.pet_notice_no = p.pet_notice_no WHERE ROWNUM <= ( #{pageMaker.cri.pageNum, jdbcType=INTEGER} * #{pageMaker.cri.amount} ) AND f.nickname=#{nickname} ) WHERE RN > ( ( #{pageMaker.cri.pageNum, jdbcType=INTEGER} - 1 ) * #{pageMaker.cri.amount} )
